name: SPLIT (itch) (gamecreame)
description:
HOW?

Space/left mouse button - to split cubes

Split cubes to avoid obstacles

The simplest action game you can imagine

1 tap action
Reach for the highest score possible

Shortly about the project: 

One of the first games that I made on my own. I was making it for publishing on google play. But eventually realized how bad the game is so I put it to the side. Anyway I want to put it out just as the presentation of one of my steps on game dev journey 

For people who try it. Thanks for your time
